selections.name: Aurum Belle
selections.reason: Snitzel filly who looked professional winning her trial at Belmont Park. Dam is a multiple Group 2 winner. Hard to go past this pedigree and stable combination on debut.

selections.name: Afireofgidgeecoals
selections.reason: Won a barrier trial impressively. William Pike takes the ride which is a massive signal of intent. Barrier 10 is the only negative but has the speed to overcome it.

selections.name: Stern Empire
selections.reason: Has the benefit of race experience, finishing 2nd last start. Drawn perfectly in barrier 3 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Firearm
selections.reason: Resuming after a spell. Showed ability in recent trial behind the top selection. Can run a bold race fresh.

danger_horse.name: Afireofgidgeecoals
danger_horse.reason: Pike booking suggests this horse is ready to fire on debut despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Asif (NZ)
selections.reason: Coming off a strong win at this track and distance, beating the main danger. Meets them on similar weight terms and is in peak form.

selections.name: Fancy Red
selections.reason: Consistent mare who was narrowly beaten by Asif last start. Pike sticks, and she rarely runs a bad race.

selections.name: Devoted
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Listed company. The 60kg is a burden, but his class edge is undeniable in this small field.

selections.name: Stylish Lord
selections.reason: Racing well and was a solid 2nd last start. Honest campaigner who will be thereabouts.

danger_horse.name: Fancy Red
danger_horse.reason: Pike factor and consistency make her the logical threat to turn the tables.

selections.name: Snow God
selections.reason: Resuming here. Won a recent trial and gets William Pike. First-up record is solid and looks primed for this.

selections.name: Excess Baggage
selections.reason: Won well last start at Belmont Park. Improving filly who can handle the step up.

selections.name: Masamune
selections.reason: Resuming. Has a good fresh record and drawn well. Watch for market moves.

selections.name: Earth God
selections.reason: Consistent type who wasn't far away last start. Can feature in the placings.

selections.name: Wonderfully Made
selections.reason: Bolted in by 4.5 lengths last start. Pike rides again. Looks a class above this field and the step up in trip should suit.

selections.name: Monte Tremezzo
selections.reason: Won well last start at Pinjarra. Drawn to get a perfect run and is the main danger.

selections.name: Nature's Reckoning
selections.reason: Another last start winner who won by 3 lengths. In great form.

selections.name: Masmelo
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Barrier 1 helps.

danger_horse.name: Monte Tremezzo
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner with a good gate.

selections.name: Southern Firetail
selections.reason: Pike takes the ride. Finished 3rd last start and looks ready to peak. Light weight is a big plus.

selections.name: Pressurised (NZ)
selections.reason: Won his maiden impressively last start. Clint Johnston-Porter aboard. Drawn well to step up in grade.

selections.name: Lien Hyphen
selections.reason: Won last start at this track. Wide gate is a concern but form is hard to knock.

selections.name: Classic Impact
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran 2nd last start. Will be in the finish.

danger_horse.name: Pressurised (NZ)
danger_horse.reason: Progressive type with a good jockey booking.

selections.name: Amaroo Star
selections.reason: Pike rides. Won last start beating a key rival here. Drawn ideally to stalk the pace and strike.

selections.name: Haida Gwaii
selections.reason: Won last start at this track. Drawn barrier 3 which is a huge advantage in these sprints.

selections.name: Santanova
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick of wins. Has plenty of speed to overcome the wide draw.

selections.name: Tycoon Harry
selections.reason: Won last start. Consistent sprinter who is always competitive.

danger_horse.name: Haida Gwaii
danger_horse.reason: Inside draw and winning form make her a major threat.

selections.name: Magical Sequence
selections.reason: Won well last start at this track. Pike rides and drawn barrier 4. Ticks all the boxes.

selections.name: Spank Appeal
selections.reason: Ran a solid 2nd last start. Drawn well and should get a lovely run.

selections.name: Bird's The Word
selections.reason: Last start winner. Has to overcome a wide gate but has the class.

selections.name: Later Alligator
selections.reason: Consistent type. 2nd last start. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Spank Appeal
danger_horse.reason: Good draw and recent form suggests he is close to a win.

selections.name: Dominatus
selections.reason: Finished 2nd in the LR Challenge last start. Pike rides. Drawn perfectly. The one to beat.

selections.name: Aberdeen Flyer
selections.reason: Ran 3rd in the same race as Dominatus. Form is strong.

selections.name: Linchpin
selections.reason: 4th in the key reference race. Consistent.

selections.name: The Crimson Pirate
selections.reason: Won a CL1 well last start. Steps up in class but has ability.

danger_horse.name: Aberdeen Flyer
danger_horse.reason: Close finish last time, legitimate threat.

selections.name: Hubble's Dragon
selections.reason: Ran 2nd in the LR 3yo Magic Millions. That form is superior to this field. Pike rides. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Hey Pino
selections.reason: Won well last start. Has to deal with a wide gate but is in winning form.

selections.name: Amjaad
selections.reason: Class runner resuming. Barrier 13 is tough but has the ability to overcome it.

selections.name: Kelvinater
selections.reason: Drawn well. Can improve on recent form.
